title: Fried calves' liver with straw fries, onion rings and cavolo nero
description: A tasty meal of calves’ livers fried in butter, deep-fried onion rings, chips and a quick but classy brandy mustard sauce.
ingredients: salt and freshly ground black pepper
600g/1lb 5oz potatoes, peeled and cut into ½cm/¼in chips
2 small onions, finely sliced into rings
